CHAT.comment: This is one file of a three Mother-Child case study. MAY 18 , 1988 the girls' texts were added to MOTHER'S TEXTS. SOURCE is FRANCES FUCHS SCHACHTER'S 1979 STUDY 0901.txt is POOR BLACK MOTHER , 0902.txt is MIDDLE CLASS BLACK MOTHER , 0903.TXT is MIDDLE CLASS WHITE MOTHER. SCHAC4.TXT is THE CHILDREN , ALL GIRLS ABOUT 3 YEARS OF AGE. MOM 9 is THREE MOTHER-CHILD CASES FROM MOM0901.TXT
THIS CASE IS THE POOR BLACK MOTHER ONLY SPEAKING WITH RHONDA.
This Transcript has the mother's speech separated from the child's.
THIS IS RHONDA , POOR BLACK girl , age 3 , Speaking to Mother.
